Fasturtle is a leading provider of Digital Marketing Solutions; including website design, search engine ranking, and digital marketing strategy. We are an Arizona based, top 10 ranking internet marketing firm specializing in helping small-medium size businesses, non-profit organizations, and service industry professionals.  Since 2000, we have successfully delivered the most innovative and cost effective tools to expand your brand online. Working with clients in many different industries we have the skills to develop revenue generating solutions while keeping your costs down.Fasturtle has been consistently ranked one of Phoenix, Arizona’s Top 10 Website Design and Internet Marketing Companies by Ranking AZ and the Phoenix Business Journal. With over 14 years of experience, an “A+” Rating by BBB and numerous other design and marketing awards including the American Marketing Association 2012 Spectrum Award, we proudly offer the highest level of customer service and results oriented internet marketing solutions.Fasturtle: Fast Turtle (N) /fast/ tur·tle /ˈtərtl/ – Many groups and cultures around the world symbolize the turtle as the wisest of all, good health, long life and protection.  We at Fasturtle view our business integrity, operations model and scopes of work in the same light.  We are committed to authentic, honorable, effective and long lasting business relationships with all of our clients.  Our Fasturtle programs be it SEO Management, Email Marketing or Website Design are spearheaded and developed for long term sustainability.

AcaMedic Solutions has been a leader in healthcare practice marketing since 2002. AcaMedic specializes in assisting practices meet their volume expectations through integrated digital marketing. AcaMedic’s focus over the last decade has been in the venous insufficiency market, supporting vein centers through the AcaMedic Solutions brand. The results from our vein-centric marketing efforts show that similar processes and services are a great fit for practices in other health verticals.

Owned by ASU and originally called Camp Tontozona, the retreat center served as the pre-season training site for the Arizona State University football team for nearly fifty years. Numerous coaches have taken their athletes to train on the renowned sports field built on the property. Under the direction of Tonto Creek Camp, the nonprofit that assumed management of the camp, it was re-branded in 2010 as Tonto Creek Camp and opened to the public.Passionate to maintain the values and traditions embodied during those first generations in the tall pines, we’re currently supporting Arizona youth, schools and local nonprofits who serve youth by providing outdoor education and leadership.

The Fiesta Bowl Committee is a team of passionate community leaders that supports the mission of the bowl organization and its positive impact in the Valley. Through elite bowl games and related events, the Fiesta Bowl serves as welcoming hosts, creates lifelong memories, promotes Arizona and enables meaningful contributions to society.The Fiesta Bowl Committee's objectives are to:• Work alongside the sponsors, volunteers, staff and Board of Directors to continually deliver the traditional Fiesta Bowl experience.• Serve as the backbone of the organization's fundraising efforts; provide leadership for Fiesta Bowl events and to promote bowl initiatives in the region.

Children’s Museum of Phoenix’s mission is to engage the minds, muscles and imaginations of children and the grown-ups who care about them. With hands-on, interactive exhibits designed for children ages birth to 10, the Museum focuses on learning through play, with emphasis on early childhood education and school-readiness.The Museum’s vision is to foster a joy of learning and to:•Provide engaging projects, exhibits and programming for young children and their families;•Educate parents and caregivers about child development and parenting techniques;•Build cultural understanding, positive social interaction, and celebrate diversity; and•Serve as a gateway to other cultural institutions and community programs.

summary: President and CEO of one of Arizona's most talented website design and search engine optimization firms; Fasturtle. We are dedicated to improving our clients marketing efforts through the best interactive practices. Fasturtle is the best website design and digital marketing companies in AZ. We are consistently Business Journal Top 25 and Ranked in the Top 10 Ranking AZ by our clients and colleagues. To join the Turtle family, either as a client or an employee please call 1 (888) 468-8785 today!Fasturtle offers professional website design and internet marketing programs that drive business, we have helped 100's of small business owners, doctors, lawyers and more build their businesses and practices since 2000.Specialties: search engine marketing; SEO, search engine optimization, website design and development, Word Press development. Word Press theme design, email hosting, domain registration, MySQL, PHP development, logo design, brand identity, corporate identity and much more.
